## MediaDeviceSelectProps interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface MediaDeviceSelectProps extends React.HTMLAttributes<HTMLUListElement>
```

**Extends:** React.HTMLAttributes&lt;HTMLUListElement&gt;

{% partial file="p_usage.md" /%}

## Properties

| Property                                                                        | Type                                      | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [exactMatch?](./react/mediadeviceselectprops.exactmatch.md)                     | boolean                                   | _(Optional)_ will force the browser to only return the specified device will call <code>onDeviceSelectError</code> with the error in case this fails                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [initialSelection?](./react/mediadeviceselectprops.initialselection.md)         | string                                    | _(Optional)_                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [kind](./react/mediadeviceselectprops.kind.md)                                  | MediaDeviceKind                           |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [onActiveDeviceChange?](./react/mediadeviceselectprops.onactivedevicechange.md) | (deviceId: string) =&gt; void             | _(Optional)_                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [onDeviceListChange?](./react/mediadeviceselectprops.ondevicelistchange.md)     | (devices: MediaDeviceInfo\[\]) =&gt; void | _(Optional)_                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [onDeviceSelectError?](./react/mediadeviceselectprops.ondeviceselecterror.md)   | (e: Error) =&gt; void                     | _(Optional)_                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [requestPermissions?](./react/mediadeviceselectprops.requestpermissions.md)     | boolean                                   | _(Optional)_ this will call getUserMedia if the permissions are not yet given to enumerate the devices with device labels. in some browsers multiple calls to getUserMedia result in multiple permission prompts. It's generally advised only flip this to true, once a (preview) track has been acquired successfully with the appropriate permissions. |
| [track?](./react/mediadeviceselectprops.track.md)                               | LocalAudioTrack \| LocalVideoTrack        | _(Optional)_                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
